entry.title: Reset Cisco Aironet 2602i
entry.summary: Connect the console cable Unplug the power or network cable if connected to a POE switch Press and hold the Mode button Plug the power back into the AP Wait until the output on the console says button is pressed. Wait for button to be released… Once…
entry.content:
• Connect the console cable
  • Unplug the power or network cable if connected to a POE switch
  • Press and hold the Mode button
  • Plug the power back into the AP
  • Wait until the output on the console says button is pressed. Wait for button to be released…
  • Once that message is displayed release the button and allow the AP to boot

entry.title: Config Cisco Aironet Cisco Aironet 1602/2602/3602 2 SSID
entry.summary: Je fais ce post pour classer cette config d'AP cisco voici la source initiale ! logging rate-limit console 9 ! aaa new-model ! ! aaa authentication login default local aaa authorization exec default local ! aaa session-id common no ip routing no ip cef ip…
entry.content:
Je fais ce post pour classer cette config d'AP cisco

voici la source initiale

!
 logging rate-limit console 9
 !
 aaa new-model
 !
 !
 aaa authentication login default local
 aaa authorization exec default local
 !
 aaa session-id common
 no ip routing
 no ip cef
 ip domain name domain.corp
 !
 !
 !
 !
 dot11 syslog
 !
 dot11 ssid corp
 vlan 11
 authentication open
 authentication key-management wpa version 2
 mbssid guest-mode
 wpa-psk ascii Welcome1
 !
 dot11 ssid guest
 vlan 21
 authentication open
 authentication key-management wpa version 2
 guest-mode
 mbssid guest-mode
 wpa-psk ascii Welcome1
 !
 !
 dot11 guest
 !
 !
 !
 !
 !
 bridge irb
 !
 !
 !
 interface Dot11Radio0
 no ip address
 no ip route-cache
 !
 encryption vlan 11 mode ciphers aes-ccm tkip
 !
 encryption vlan 21 mode ciphers aes-ccm tkip
 !
 ssid corp
 !
 ssid guest
 !
 antenna gain 0
 mbssid
 station-role root
 !
 interface Dot11Radio0.11
 encapsulation dot1Q 11 native
 no ip route-cache
 bridge-group 1+
 bridge-group 1 subscriber-loop-control
 bridge-group 1 spanning-disabled
 bridge-group 1 block-unknown-source
 no bridge-group 1 source-learning
 no bridge-group 1 unicast-flooding
 !
 interface Dot11Radio0.21
 encapsulation dot1Q 21
 no ip route-cache
 bridge-group 21
 bridge-group 21 subscriber-loop-control
 bridge-group 21 spanning-disabled
 bridge-group 21 block-unknown-source
 no bridge-group 21 source-learning
 no bridge-group 21 unicast-flooding
 !
 interface Dot11Radio1
 no ip address
 no ip route-cache
 !
 encryption vlan 11 mode ciphers aes-ccm tkip
 !
 encryption vlan 21 mode ciphers aes-ccm tkip
 !
 ssid corp
 !
 ssid guest
 !
 antenna gain 0
 peakdetect
 dfs band 3 block
 stbc
 beamform ofdm
 mbssid
 channel dfs
 station-role root
 !
 interface Dot11Radio1.11
 encapsulation dot1Q 11 native
 no ip route-cache
 bridge-group 1
 bridge-group 1 subscriber-loop-control
 bridge-group 1 spanning-disabled
 bridge-group 1 block-unknown-source
 no bridge-group 1 source-learning
 no bridge-group 1 unicast-flooding
 !
 interface Dot11Radio1.21
 encapsulation dot1Q 21
 no ip route-cache
 bridge-group 21
 bridge-group 21 subscriber-loop-control
 bridge-group 21 spanning-disabled
 bridge-group 21 block-unknown-source
 no bridge-group 21 source-learning
 no bridge-group 21 unicast-flooding
 !
 interface GigabitEthernet0
 no ip address
 no ip route-cache
 duplex auto
 speed auto
 !
 interface GigabitEthernet0.11
 encapsulation dot1Q 11
 no ip route-cache
 bridge-group 1
 bridge-group 1 spanning-disabled
 no bridge-group 1 source-learning
 !
 interface GigabitEthernet0.21
 encapsulation dot1Q 21
 no ip route-cache
 no ip route-cache
 bridge-group 21
 no bridge-group 21 source-learning
 bridge-group 21 spanning-disabled
 !
 interface BVI1
 ip address 10.10.100.240 255.255.255.0
 no ip route-cache
 !
 ip default-gateway 10.10.100.250
 ip forward-protocol nd
 ip http server
 ip http authentication aaa
 no ip http secure-server
 ip http help-path http://www.cisco.com/warp/public/779/smbiz/prodconfig/help/eag
 !
 !
 !
 bridge 1 route ip
 !
 !
 !
 line con 0
 line vty 0 4
 transport input all
 !
 hostname company-location-wap01
 crypto key generate rsa modulus 2048
 end
